tar

    The GNU version of the tar archiving utility

    [ tar -> https://explainshell.com/explain/1/tar ]

x

    -x, --extract, --get
          extract files from an archive

z

    -z, --gzip, --gunzip --ungzip

v

    -v, --verbose
          verbosely list files processed

f archive.tar.gz

    -f, --file ARCHIVE
          use archive file or device ARCHIVE
